nodes.bodyText: I think we should reuse an existing instance (constructor parameter?)
You can create a field for this variable (and instantiate it a @Before method`)
You should use eq(State.LEADER) instead of the direct value
Please use any(State.class) with never() to be more reliable
Please use any(State.class) with never() to be more reliable

A method like getOrCreate should:

prevent multiple initialization
return the value

Please rename it to initKafkaConsumer if there is no check nor value to return :)
Are you sure it is not possible to subclass/set directly some fields and avoid to have a test specific method?
